Text: Hi, can someone explain what this download is... Im tired of windows and whant to try linux - but i have never been into linux, not even seen it on a computer only heard that its very good - help??? someone

Try out Ubuntu Ultimate 1.6.
I think its one of the best distro's out so far.
There is a ton of community support for it.
